title: Resources for DiRAC2 at HPCs
abstractText: The component of the STFC DiRAC computer hosted by the High Performance Computing Service at University of Cambridge will be used to carry out cutting edge research into theoreical particle physics, cosmology and astrophysics. This research is highly relevant to experiments at the Large Hadron Collider and to theoretical analysis of Gaia and Planck satellite data as well as other experiments and observations relevant to these research areas.
